name: Froggy Mania
description:
This game was made for the MiniJam-106.

Collect all the coins before the time is up.

Controls
  • WASD- Move
  • SPACE - Jump
  • MOUSE - Look around
Credits
  • Frogs - Made by quaternius
  • Enviroment - Made by Keith at Fertile Soil Productions
  • Music - Made by buffy.cz - https://opengameart.org/content/happy-frog-song
